posts.text: Views for @NPR on the #deals between #Trump and other economies: “I call this the psychology of surrender. Everybody is surrendering. That may lead to a near-term reaction by foreign consumers against the U.S. — akin to how Canadians retaliated against Trump's tariffs by avoiding American products.
